data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Niedbała, Wojciech, Ermilov, Sergey G. (2017): New species and records of ptyctimous mites (Acari, Oribatida) from the Philippines. Zootaxa 4231 (1): 119-128, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4231.1.9|7 occurrences
